wikipedia_page.main: Charles Cook (born 3 June 1898) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an outside left.

response: Charles Cooke (born 14 October 1942) is a Scottish former footballer. He played as a winger for Aberdeen, Dundee, Chelsea and Crystal Palace, before ending his career in the United States.
